metadata.title: CVE-2021-32438 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The gf_media_export_filters function in GPAC 1.0.1 allows attackers tocause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted file inthe MP4Box command.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
